content.rendered:
Tuesday, April 1st  

     Today is a “C” Day 

 

                                      

  • Attention Maple Students and Staff! We’re excited to announce a brand-new monthly tradition here at Maple: Wellness Wednesday! On the first Wednesday of every month, we encourage everyone to embrace comfort and self-care by wearing your favorite pajamas or any comfy clothes to school. Our very first Wellness Wednesday will take place on April 2, so get ready to get cozy and join in the fun. Let’s make Wellness Wednesdays a special part of our Maple spirit! 

 

  • There is a student council meeting on Wednesday after school in Mrs. Kerls room. 

 

  • Attention Pop Culture Icon Club, we are meeting Wednesday, after school, in the Large Group Room. Please let Ms. Schnorr know if you need a late bus pass. 

 

  • Grade 7 Chorus Altos have a sectional rehearsal today during Flex. Chorus 7 Altos should check in with their flex teacher and then report to the chorus room for rehearsal. 

 *Lunch today is crispy chicken sandwich with NY pickles and waffle fries.
